sn35.20:1: "Yo, bhikkhave, rūpe abhinandati, dukkhaṁ so abhinandati. Yo dukkhaṁ abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmi. Yo sadde … pe … gandhe … rase … phoṭṭhabbe … dhamme abhinandati, dukkhaṁ so abhinandati. Yo dukkhaṁ abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmā"ti vadāmi.
sn35.20:2: "Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, rūpe nābhinandati, dukkhaṁ so nābhinandati. Yo dukkhaṁ nābhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasmā"ti vadāmi. Yo sadde … pe … gandhe … rase … phoṭṭhabbe … dhamme nābhinandati, dukkhaṁ so nābhinandati. Yo dukkhaṁ nābhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasmā"ti vadāmi.
